hunderstorm Sue was an unsavory human mage mercenary from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Sue was a woman with brown hair, brown eyes, and fair skin tone. She wore teal-colored mages robes.
In the , the opportunistic and amoral mercenary Aradin Beno set out to find the Nightsong for the mage Lorroakan. If the Nightsong, in reality a Sel√ªnite aasimar, was to reach the city of Baldurs Gate, then Beno had a band of mercenaries with questionable morals ready to attack those who sheltered her. The wizard named Thunderstorm Sue was among those mercenaries, ready to break into the Elfsong Tavern to kill and kidnap.
